TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FederationConfiguration extends System.Object

summary.span: 公開屬性，這些屬性包含可在 Web 應用程式中控制 WS-同盟驗證模組 () 及工作階段驗證模組 () 之行為的聯盟設定。

span.span: Exposes properties that contain federation settings that control the behavior of the WS-Federation Authentication Module () and the Session Authentication Module () in web applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，web 應用程式具有單一物件，透過存取屬性。By default web applications have a single object that is accessed through the property. 在屬性經過存取新的第一次執行個體初始化自組態檔中設定和就會引發事件。The first time the property is accessed a new instance is initialized from settings in the configuration file and the event is raised. 您可以使用的屬性和方法所公開類別來修改或取代從事件處理常式中的組態初始化的物件。You can use the properties and methods exposed by the class to modify or replace the object initialized from configuration in an event handler. 這個物件是可透過事件處理常式內的屬性。This object is available through the property inside the event handler.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 之前的新執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫方法，以確保已適當初始化的執行個體。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 藉由從組態檔的 區段載入設定，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by loading settings from the section of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的新執行個體的屬性會初始化所載入的設定``組態區段。The properties in the new instance are initialized by loading settings from the `` configuration section. 這個建構函式會呼叫建構函式`loadConfig`參數`true`。This constructor calls the constructor with the `loadConfig` parameter `true`. > [!WARNING] > 之前的新執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫方法，以確保已適當初始化的執行個體。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool loadConfig) cil managed

param.name: loadConfig
param.span: 表示要使用從組態檔載入的設定來初始化， 表示要初始化為預設值。

span.span: to initialize with settings loaded from the configuration file; to initialize to default values.

summary.span: 選擇性地從組態檔的 區段載入設定，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by optionally loading settings from the section of the configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 之前的新執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫方法，以確保已適當初始化的執行個體。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized. `system.identityModel`區段中必須指定`
`下方的項目``擲回例外狀況的組態檔中的項目。The `system.identityModel` section must be specified in a `
` element under the `` element in the configuration file or an exception is thrown. ```
``` 如果`loadConfig`是`true`和 只有一個``指定項目，則會載入設定，使用該元素。If `loadConfig` is `true` and only a single `` element is specified, settings are loaded using that element. 如果有多個``項目指定，則方法會嘗試載入未命名的項目中設定有。If multiple `` elements are specified, the method attempts to load settings from the element that is unnamed of that has the . 如果這類項目不存在，這個方法會傳回而不載入設定。If such an element does not exist, the method returns without loading settings. 這會導致例外狀況時呼叫方法。This results in an exception when the method is called. > [!WARNING] > Microsoft 建議，如果您指定多個``中的項目`system.identityModel.services`組態區段，至少其中一個未命名，或其名稱設定為空字串。Microsoft recommends that if you specify multiple `` elements in the `system.identityModel.services` configuration section that at least one of them is unnamed or has its name set to an empty string.

exception.span: 組態區段未在組態檔中定義。

span.span: The configuration section is not defined in the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string federationConfigurationName) cil managed

param.name: federationConfigurationName

summary.span: 從指定名稱的 [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) 項目，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element with the specified name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 之前的新執行個體由任何已設定的 HTTP 模組，請呼叫方法，以確保已適當初始化的執行個體。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized. 如果在呼叫這個建構函式則會顯示``組態區段``具有指定的名稱的項目必須在組態檔。If this constructor is called then a `` configuration section with a `` element that has the specified name must exist in the configuration file. 這兩個`system.identityModel`一節和`system.identityModel.services`中必須指定`
`下的項目``擲回例外狀況的組態檔中的項目。Both the `system.identityModel` section and the `system.identityModel.services` must be specified in a `
` elements under the `` element in the configuration file or an exception is thrown. ```
```

span.span: The cookie handler to be used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定用來讀取和寫入工作階段 cookie sam 的 cookie 處理常式。Specifies the cookie handler that is used to read and write session cookies by the SAM. 初始化從組態檔，此屬性由設定[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)項目。When initialized from a configuration file, this property is set by the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.

abstract member Initialize : unit -> unit override this.Initialize : unit -> unit

summary.span: 初始化目前的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可確保它可由 HTTP 模組來處理傳入的要求之前，已經過適當初始化目前的執行個體。This method ensures that the current instance is properly initialized before it is used by the HTTP Modules to process incoming requests. 它應該只呼叫一次。It should only be called once. 檢查屬性，才能呼叫方法。Check the property before calling the method. 這個方法會設定屬性設定`true`。This method sets the property is set `true`. 如果有一個不透過已設定的預設實作會建立預設 cookie 處理常式屬性，並呼叫身分識別組態物件上的方法，透過設定屬性。The default implementation creates a default cookie handler if there is not one already configured through the property and calls the method on the identity configuration object that is configured through the property. 您可以覆寫這個方法來修改此行為，或提供額外的初始化衍生類別中。You can override this method to modify this behavior or to provide additional initialization in derived classes. 類別供 HTTP 模組來處理傳入的要求之前，應叫用這個方法。This method should be invoked before the class is used by the HTTP Modules to process incoming requests.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經初始化 ( 屬性為 )。

span.span: The current instance has already been initialized (The property is .)

summary.span: 從組態檔載入目前執行個體的屬性。

span.span: Loads the properties for the current instance from the configuration file.

summary.span: 從組態設定初始化新建立之 的建構函式會呼叫這個方法。

span.span: This method is called by constructors that initialize the newly created from configuration settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定新建立之屬性的建構函式會呼叫方法從指定的物件``項目。The method is called by the constructors to set the properties of the newly created object from the specified `` element. 如果`element`是`null`，使用預設值載入執行個體。If `element` is `null`, the instance is loaded with default values. 如果是沒有設定檔，或如果具名的區段不存在，則不會擲回例外狀況，改為執行個體載入預設值。If the there is no configuration file, or, if the named section does not exist, then no exception is thrown, instead the instance is loaded with default values.
